forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight, then a chance of rain between midnight and 1am, then a chance of freezing drizzle and a chance of drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 7am. Mostly cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. Northwest wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday

Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Hey SK8TR BOIS: please try to keep your ski tips out of the classic tracks on Bucks Run. Instead, use that destructive energy to knock down the little berm the groomer leaves for you on the skate deck - thanksClassic skiers: the man made snow is fast and there is good grip with fish scales going up the “hill” - enjoy!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful start to the day a light wind and a clear sky. The grooming looks excellent and the snow is in good shape. The temperature is forecast to go slightly above freezing this afternoon. Pintail Peak is now open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is broccoli cheddar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
